CustomField.formula: TEXT(Job_Rate__c) + TEXT(IF(High_Urgency__c, 1, 0)+IF(Candidate_can_be_Found__c, 1, 0)+IF(Technicaly_Right_Person__c, 1, 0)+IF( Without_CV__c, 1, 0)+IF( Buy_In__c, 1, 0)+IF( Have_Customers__c, 1, 0)+IF( Quick_Decisions__c, 1, 0)+IF( All_Involved__c, 1, 0)+IF( Available_for_Call__c, 1, 0)+IF( Flexibility_Profile__c, 1, 0)+IF( Flexibility_Process__c, 1, 0)+IF( C_Level_Job__c, 1, 0))
CustomField.label: Job Rating
